code: import Dialog from'@mui/material/Dialog';import DialogActions from'@mui/material/DialogActions';import DialogContent from'@mui/material/DialogContent';import DialogContentText from'@mui/material/DialogContentText';import DialogTitle from'@mui/material/DialogTitle';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{makeStyles}from'@mui/styles';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var useStyle=makeStyles({root:{'& .MuiPaper-root':{position:'absolute',top:'0px',width:'360px'}},title:{textAlign:'center'},subTitle:{textAlign:'center'},action:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center'}});export var ConfirmDialog=function ConfirmDialog(props){var open=props.open,handleClose=props.onClose,handleOnOk=props.onOk;var classes=useStyle();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:handleClose,className:classes.root,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogTitle,{className:classes.title,children:"Are you sure to delete it?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogContent,{className:classes.subTitle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogContentText,{children:"It cann't get back any way!"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{className:classes.action,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{autoFocus:true,onClick:handleClose,children:"Cancle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleOnOk,autoFocus:true,children:"Ok"})]})]});};
